MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the CH4 postcode area of Penyffordd affecting properties in Fairview, Westfield Drive and surrounding area. Restoration is taking longer than expected because of a suspected underground cable fault and our team are now working to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 12:30pm. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 7:54am on 15th December 2020.
